ComicInfo.Summary: Lo, the Leader Lives: With the Hulk once again in custody, Ross tries to find someone who can put the jade giant under wraps for good. Lucky for him the "reformed" Leader shows up and creates an unbreakable plastic prison that will hold the Hulk forever.
